downloadDescription: This document explains how Microsoft Visio 2010 helps users to gain valuable business insights using Visio 2010 and Visio Services.
detailsSection: Visio 2010’s advanced diagramming tools help you simplify complexity with dynamic, data-driven visuals and new ways to share on the Web in real-time. Whether you’re creating an org chart, a network diagram, or a business process, Visio’s new tools and more intuitive interface make it easy to bring your diagrams to life. Start by building your diagram with a diverse set of modern shapes. Then, by linking to popular data sources (such as Excel®), you’ll see real-time data automatically refresh right within your diagram. Finally, with just a few clicks, you can publish your data-linked diagram to SharePoint® Server 2010, and share it with others via their browser. Together, simplicity, data-driven shapes, and Web sharing make Visio 2010 one of the most powerful ways to see and understand important information.
installInstructionSection: Download the document by clicking in “DOWNLOAD” button (above).
